name: Spot 10 Differences
description:
In this game, there are 24 levels.

In each level, you see two versions of one image and have to find the 10 differences between them by clicking on those spots.

How to Play: 
Click the difference in either image.

You can exit the game and it will save the rooms you have finished.

When you come back to play again it will start where you left off.

Install Instructions:
Download the zip file. 
Extract the files. 
Run  "Spot 10 Differences.exe"

Note: you may get a "publisher could not be verified" message - just click run.
